RumorFact.Text: I found a frozen comet hidden in the shadow of Giant's Deep.
I entered a black hole at the center of the comet. I was warped into a space with glowing masks, filled with ghost matter.
The Inspired was constructed in the Interloper's image.
The ghost matter collected by the Inspired was warped into the Deep Storm Station for containment.
The Inspired was made to bring destruction to the source of ghost matter.

ExploreFact.Text: An artificial comet made of gravity crystals, made to bring destruction to the source of the Interloper.
The Inspired was repurposed to protect the Hearthians when its creator realized that they were endangered by ghost matter.
The Inspired's warp core was replaced, allowing it to warp all collected ghost matter to the Deep Storm Station for containment.
